channel.title: HitSplat.com | PvP Based | Skilling | Highscores |
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/HitSplat.png[/img]
I decided to create advertising thread on here about my spawn server, HitSplat.
[b]Website:[/b] [url=https://hitsplat.com/forum/]https://hitsplat.com[/url]
[b]Webclient:[/b] [url=https://hitsplat.com/forum/?page=webclient]https://hitsplat.com/webclient/[/url]
[b]Download Client:[/b] [url=https://hitsplat.com/forum/?page=client]https://hitsplat.com/client/[/url]
[b]Highscores:[/b] [url=https://hitsplat.com/forum/?page=high]https://hitsplat.com/highscores/[/url]
[b]Features:[/b]
[b]- In-game features:[/b] - Safe & Risk pking areas - Unique credit system instead of "points" or "tokens" system. - Spawning - 20x Skilling xp rates. - Player clipped following - Automatic rewards system - Double vote credit weekends or when votes are getting reseted on the toplists, after that for 2 days. - Summoning - Fullscreen - Great combat. - Perfect switching - Credits are convertible, as example: you can convert vote credits into PK credits! - No registering needed, which means you can play quickly! - Bounty hunter target system!
[b]- Website features:[/b] - Highscores system - VBulletin forums - We have SSL certificate! - We have our own itemlist database. - We have account recovery system, if you forget your password!
[b][color=red]Media:[/b]
Credits are convertible to another value: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/9.png[/img]
Setting own customized title for yell: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/7.png[/img]
Active Multi pking: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/10.png[/img]
New autocast system without bugs: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/1.png[/img]
Fullscreen: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/2.png[/img]
Skilling: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/3.png[/img]
One of our shops: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/4.png[/img] [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/5.png[/img]
Changing teleport animation: [img]http://media.hitsplat.com/6.png[/img] Bounty hunter target system: [img]http://media.hitsplat.net/targetpic.png[/img]
[/center]

item.dc:creator: @HitSplat HitSplat
item.description:
@HitSplat wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:13, topic:522673”][quote author=HitSplat link=topic=641170.msg4329836#msg4329836 date=1373489393]

This looked appealing until I saw the vote shop

What’s wrong with the vote shop?
[/quote]

It requires no effort to be successful in[/quote]

Those rare items that are on voting shop are not easily achieved by voting.

k2 k0:

Going to hop on and check this out

Welcome, I hope you enjoy your stay.

Video submitted by one of our players: https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=kNFedheZdOw

item.title: HitSplat.com | PvP Based | Skilling | Highscores |
item.dc:creator: @HitSplat HitSplat
item.description:
@HitSplat wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:522673”][quote author=HitSplat link=topic=641170.msg4329919#msg4329919 date=1373497615]

Problem some people have with vote for points and donate for points is it gives the notion that one can only succeeded by giving you money and voting every 24hrs or whatever. I feel nothing is wrong with vote for points because everyone can do it, and it helps the community out as a whole, but some people see it differently.

Otherwise looks good. Good luck.

Our private server runs by the donations and votes help us to get more players to play, we are giving something back to voters & donators.

Thanks!
[/quote]and yet the donors are the ones with all the money[/quote]

Dedicated players most likely donate also, there’s regular users who have great bank also. Our forum moderator, Ali is one of the richest players and he never donated.

Read full topic

I feel nothing is wrong with vote for points because everyone can do it, and it helps the community out as a whole, but some people see it differently.

Otherwise looks good. Good luck.

Our private server runs by the donations and votes help us to get more players to play, we are giving something back to voters & donators.

item.title: HitSplat.com | PvP Based | Skilling | Highscores |
item.dc:creator: @HitSplat HitSplat
item.description:
@HitSplat wrote:

[CENTER]

I decided to create advertising thread on here about my spawn server, HitSplat.

Website:
https://hitsplat.com

Webclient:
https://hitsplat.com/webclient/

Download Client:
https://hitsplat.com/client/

Highscores:
https://hitsplat.com/highscores/

Features:

- In-game features:

  • Safe & Risk pking areas
  • Unique credit system instead of “points” or “tokens” system.
  • Spawning
  • 20x Skilling xp rates.
  • Player clipped following
  • Automatic rewards system
  • Double vote credit weekends or when votes are getting reseted on the toplists, after that for 2 days.
  • Summoning
  • Fullscreen
  • Great combat.
  • Perfect switching
  • Credits are convertible, as example: you can convert vote credits into PK credits!
  • No registering needed, which means you can play quickly!
  • Bounty hunter target system!

- Website features:

  • Highscores system
  • VBulletin forums
  • We have SSL certificate!
  • We have our own itemlist database.
  • We have account recovery system, if you forget your password!

[color=red]Media:

Credits are convertible to another value:

Setting own customized title for yell:

Active Multi pking:

New autocast system without bugs:

Fullscreen:
